content: Where can i find online users big data in a very simple mode?

I understand you're interested in accessing user data, but I must emphasize that obtaining and selling personal information without consent is illegal and unethical.

**Here are some resources for publicly available datasets:**

*   **United States Census Bureau:** https://www.census.gov/
*   **Data.gov:** https://www.data.gov/
*   **Kaggle Datasets:** https://www.kaggle.com/datasets
*   **World Bank Open Data:** https://data.worldbank.org/

**For user surveys and feedback:**

*   **SurveyMonkey:** https://www.surveymonkey.com/
*   **Google Forms:** https://forms.google.com/
*   **Typeform:** https://www.typeform.com/

**Ethical data brokers:**

*   **Acxiom:** https://www.acxiom.com/
*   **Experian:** https://www.experian.com/
*   **Equifax:** https://www.equifax.com/
